=====================
 coopr.age CHANGELOG
=====================

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.1.3
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Various changes to support Python 3.X compatability.

- Minor bug fixes.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.1.2
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Return a list of packages instead of a map, to support Python 3.x

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.1.1
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Non-functional changes; reformatting.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.1
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Removed support for a 'mipgap' button.

- Added a CooprAge script to launch this GUI.

- Misc bug fixes. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.0
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Initial release.
